ProjectTitle: Resurrecting Turnout, Saving Democracy? Lowering the voting age, compulsory voting, and the legitimacy of election results
InitialFeedbackHistory:
29/02/2024
1) Data table: not very clear what type of data the "Voting at 16 Leuven-Ghent" dataset is
3) Metadata & Documentation: Suggestion "This upload contains keywords and accompanying metadata making it easier to find the dataset"
5) Data preservation: Since you will anonymize the datasets you will not preserve personal information that can be used to identify the data subjects in order to protect these data subjects.
6) Data sharing (& preservation): Maybe consider to use the KU Leuven Research Data Repository. It is build on the same open source research data repository software (= Dataverse software) as Harvard Dataverse, but it's more convenient because you receive support from KU Leuven staff + the data are preserved on KU Leuven servers + it is automatically linked with Lirias + there is an integration dashboard which makes it much easier to upload research data and so on. For more information on RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
